attributes.action: reduce foreign aid and use the money saved for social care and the nhs
attributes.background: Social care in this country is in dire straits and we should be looking after our own people first.

rejection.details:
There are already petitions asking for Foreign Aid to be spent on:

social care   https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/175627

the NHS   https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/177200

both social care and the NHS   https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/184182
